name: MAR WAR: The Evil Awakens
description: Decades after the defeat of the Evil Empire, EARTH and MAR faces a new threat from the Militarised ARMY Z. To protect the two planets from this powerful threat. Master spy Lake Walker must return from his exile to join the war...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10/Vista/XP (32 or 64 bit) Processor: Dual Core 2.0GHz or equivalent processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series, 1GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 2.0) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10/Vista/XP (32 or 64 bit) Processor: Intel Quad-Core (i5 2300) or AMD Octo-Core (FX 8150) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 660Ti or greater, AMD Radeon HD 7950 or greater, 2GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 2.0) DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
